title: Best of The Herd for Aug 18, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 18, 2020
description:
Do not blame the refs for the ejection, blame Porzingis

The Clippers win because of experience

Nick Saban says wear a mask

Most colleges are being hypocritical when it comes to football

The Cowboys are too top heavy

Baseball once again using unwritten rules to have less fun


Guest: Chris Spielman, former Ohio State & Detroit Lions Linebacker

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
